message: This offer divides the money equally. Please consider it carefully.
You'll regret rejecting my first offer!
I propose a new division where I receive $600000 and Bob receives $400000. This maintains a fair balance while also considering the inflation factor.
You're getting desperate, Alice. Don't think you can outmaneuver me!
I propose an equal division of the money, with each of us receiving $500000. This ensures fairness and prevents any further loss due to inflation.
